thread.title: TV | Person of Interest

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Person of Interest
text: A new series kicks off tonight of this Jonathan Nolan drama about a supercomputer that predicts crimes and the people who work to prevent them. We rejoin Jim Cavaziel and Lost's Michael Emerson after they have been forced to take on new identities created by Root and must try and adapt to their new lives. However, some find it hard to ignore the Machine's numbers, putting them all at risk of being detected by Samaritan.
